short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes NRR threads started by morans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: filters non running related threads from the letsrun.com messageboards. you can also blacklist posters by entering their usernames separated by commas in the blacklist input box on the settings page
